main event: On 13 August 1956, a witness observed a UFO described as having a dull brass color and a long trail of smoke, moving at the speed of an airliner.
interesting points: The object emitted no sound during the observation., The object was visible for approximately 3 minutes., The witness compared the object's speed to that of a commercial airliner., The object left behind a smoke trail after disappearing from view., There was an indication that the object was possibly an aircraft.
sighted object: a long and narrow object resembling a bullet
witness description: The witness described the object as bright, shiny, and without pollution, and they were shooting the sky when they observed it.
